text: Uwe Hartenberger (born 1 February 1968 in Germany) is a German retired footballer who now works as head coach of SC Idar-Oberstein in his home country. == References == == External links == *In conversation with Uwe Hartenberger *Rhein-Zeitung Tag *Merkurist.de Tag *Trierischer Volksfreund Tag *Unser Ex-Spieler Uwe Hartenberger ist heute 49 Jahre alt geworden *FuPa Profile *German Wikipedia Page *DFB Datencenter Profile *Soccerbase Profile Category:German footballers Category:German football managers Category:German expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in England Category:SV Darmstadt 98 players Category:FSV Zwickau players Category:VfL Osnabrück players Category:Association football forwards Category:Reading F.C. players Category:KFC Uerdingen 05 players Category:SV Waldhof Mannheim players Category:SV Eintracht Trier 05 players Category:1968 births Category:Living people
title: Uwe Hartenberger
